Posts.EditableText:
Do people collaborate on these forums?
Im a newb at scripting, and although I have no issue following video tutorials and understanding simple coding, I cannot do it myself at all. The game Im working on is very elaborate, and its the main reason I turned to quest.  But I cant do it myself, being an artist, I would prefer to concentrate on art mainly, www.deviantart.com/vxss57.
Although quest is a text based engine, I think mixed with images and sounds, my idea could be worth something (well it is to me haha).

If anyone is interested in working together, even a newb (like myself) who is interested in coding, please contact me. 
Im also willing to exchange skills, if you are working on a game and need art, Im happy to do it.
Thanks

Posts.EditableText: Nice art. I’m interested in coding a game for you. Presumably you want a parser rather than a CYOA type?
